name: THE CLEARING HOUSE ASSOCIATION
govEntities: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC)
sampleDescriptions: Issues relating to U.S. payments systems.
Issues and legislation relating to U.S. payments systems and data aggregation, and legislation protecting economic impact payments from garnishment.
Legislation regarding the protection of economic impact payments from garnishment, including S. 3841.
Legislation regarding the distribution and protection from garnishment of economic impact payments, including S. 3841.
Legislation regarding the distribution and protection from garnishment of economic impact payments.
